    \index{biblio \textit{(package)}!biblio.webquery \textit{(package)}!biblio.webquery.errors \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module biblio.webquery.errors}

    \label{biblio:webquery:errors}

Various errors thrown by the the module.

&&
  \\\cline{11-11}
  &&&&&&&&&&\multicolumn{1}{c|}{}
&&
  \\
&&&&&&&&&&\multicolumn{2}{l}{\textbf{biblio.webquery.errors.QueryThrottleError}}
\end{tabular}


An exception to throw when a query limit has been exceeded.

It serves little purpose except to distinguish failures caused by exceeding
query limits.
